message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. Time is money!
I think I deserve the bigger share, let's see what you think!
Bob, my offer is getting worse with time, and so will yours. Let's be sensible - 55 for me and 45 for you.
My offer is still better for you than the last one you made to me, considering the inflation!
Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit.  Take it before inflation eats away at the deal!
